solution_line_template: Tina made postcards for {days_worked} days, so she has made {days_worked} days * {postcards_per_day} postcards/day = <<{days_worked}*{postcards_per_day}={total_postcards_made}>>{total_postcards_made} postcards.

For every postcard, Tina gets ${price_per_postcard}, so if she sold every card, she got {total_postcards_made} postcards * ${price_per_postcard}/postcard = $<<{total_postcards_made}*{price_per_postcard}={total_money_earned}>>{total_money_earned}.
